job_title: Quality Manager in New York, NY
pros: Diverse and inclusive environment. No discrimination. Simple and Straightforward interview process. No experience required friendly Work with social impact. Excellent work-life balance. Health insurance, vision, and dental. Great PTO and paid holidays. TASC benefits. Flexible work environment. Remote, hybrid.

job_title: Director of Department in Spring Valley, NY
pros:
Uber Professional and still a family like atmosphere.
Beautiful brand new state of the art office building.
Good employees are valued and appreciated with most management positions filled from within by promoted employees.
Feedback and opinions from employees are encouraged and valued with constant anonymous surveys followed by changes and upgrades.
cons:
Too much food in the well-stocked cafeteria.

Elevator in building is super slow.

job_title: Director of Utilization Management in New York, NY
cons: i have no complaints and enjoy working at this company

pros: Hamaspik Choice is the ideal professional workplace for committed individuals that want to make a difference in peoples lives. There is a good training process and ongoing support system. Strong sense of teamwork. Lots of room for growth due to continuous company expansions. I have been with the company for quite some time and would definitely recommend a position within this agency. The office is bright and airy and has recently been renovated to a state of the art facility.
cons: I have noticed some negativity from existing or past employees but that is most probably due to recent changes rolled out, which is slowly but positively impacting the workplace.  This is a workplace that I would recommend to all.

pros: Hamaspik Choice is a great place to work for! Our HR department does a great job satisfying all employees and the supervisors are also super nice! We're a great team of about 100 employees working in our beautiful new office on Rt. 59 in Rockland County. We receive great benefits including medical, dental, vision, life and disability insurance plus paid Holiday, vacation, and sick days! I recommend Hamaspik Choice for anyone that is committed to work and is looking for a good workplace.
cons: I honestly cannot think of anything negative to say about Hamaspik Choice.

job_title: Director of Human Resources in Monsey, NY
pros: Hamaspik Choice is committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce.  They offer great benefits and competitive pay. They also foster a great relationship between senior management and employees by having monthly roundtable meeting that are attending by executive level staff answering questions and concerns and giving the latest updates.
cons: Working here for a couple of months and don't have any negative things to note

review_title: Worst of the worst places to work
pros: I honestly can’t think of one.
cons: Everything.   From the workload to the supervisors to Human Resources. Certain “people” have certain rights and it’s very obvious.   No one is happy and people literally quit from One day to the next with no notice, that’s how unhappy their staff is. There is no fairness, you’re policed and there’s a feeling of being constantly monitored.
